channel.title: Armour of the Blood Mage
channel.description:
Just a set i came up with, nothing special. It's a little plain but better then nothing.

item.title: Armour of the Blood Mage
item.dc:creator: @tubefish tubefish
item.description:
@tubefish wrote:

[quote=“dylan_0789, post:2, topic:397498”]Nice to see that this (modeling) community is finally growing enough where decent models are posted often. The models simple enough that it wont deform a lot ingame. Simplicity can be better, especially when used correctly.

Off-topic
Time for a new modeling contest, anyone?[/quote]

yup contest time end of school. so you should start it in middle of June, that when i get out and hopefully most others also.

Read full topic

item.title: Armour of the Blood Mage
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:11, topic:397498”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=494642.msg3616732#msg3616732 date=1307047440]

Anybody and everybody. Nobody entered because nobody either thought they had a chance or didn’t know how to make a armor set.

I know i won’t be in it because i don’t have a chance and never will.

Excuses like this are the reason I discontinued the modeling contests. Seriously, who gives a fuck if you don’t win? If people are taking time out of their day to model for a ‘fun’ contest, I would say its almost upsetting for those individuals when they realize: “Hey, i just spent hours on a model for the contest when theres only one other contestant.” You have the opportunity to show off your skills, and notice the improvement in your skill from contest to contest, while comparing your model to others, which allows you to see/learn what is correct, and what is not. If the first contest I post only has three people entering (as usual), then the contest will remain discontinued.

Haha, i ment i wouldnt have a chance of winning because i wouldn’t be able to finish the model. Too many things i have to do in a day leaves me with almost no free time. Suprising huh?
[/quote]
The contests are over a period 2 weeks usually. I’m sure you’ll have enough time.[/quote]
unless i get homework everyday of those 2 weeks. -.-

Read full topic

Anybody and everybody. Nobody entered because nobody either thought they had a chance or didn’t know how to make a armor set.

Excuses like this are the reason I discontinued the modeling contests. Seriously, who gives a fuck if you don’t win? If people are taking time out of their day to model for a ‘fun’ contest, I would say its almost upsetting for those individuals when they realize: “Hey, i just spent hours on a model for the contest when theres only one other contestant.” You have the opportunity to show off your skills, and notice the improvement in your skill from contest to contest, while comparing your model to others, which allows you to see/learn what is correct, and what is not. If the first contest I post only has three people entering (as usual), then the contest will remain discontinued.
[/quote]
Haha, i ment i wouldnt have a chance of winning because i wouldn’t be able to finish the model. Too many things i have to do in a day leaves me with almost no free time. Suprising huh?[/quote]
The contests are over a period 2 weeks usually. I’m sure you’ll have enough time.

Read full topic

item.title: Armour of the Blood Mage
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:3, topic:397498”][quote author=dylan_0789 link=topic=494642.msg3616471#msg3616471 date=1307025502]
Time for a new modeling contest, anyone?
[/quote]
While looking at this picture I was thinking this. I feel it is time.

@model - There’s a bit too many cuts into the platebody. Learn to make it so those cuts come together so it doesn’t create unnecessary polygons in the middle. If you don’t understand what I’m talking about, don’t worry.[/quote]
Yer, i get you. I’ll try better next time.

off topic - Who would be in the modelling contest? Last time alot of people didn’t even enter.

Read full topic

item.title: Armour of the Blood Mage
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

dylan_0789:

Time for a new modeling contest, anyone?

While looking at this picture I was thinking this. I feel it is time.

@model - There’s a bit too many cuts into the platebody. Learn to make it so those cuts come together so it doesn’t create unnecessary polygons in the middle. If you don’t understand what I’m talking about, don’t worry.

Read full topic
